file_content.text: Murderer...! Murderer! My family... you're trying to take them from me!
I'm only here for you, Ayor.
You're wrong there.
No! They are safe with me. I won't let you hurt them anymore!
You lost me.
Liar!
Real sorry for your loss.
They were in the way.
You will be! You will answer for every one of them you've hurt. Every one of them!
I could feel each of their minds snuffed out. Your face, always your face in their eyes. It's burned into my mind!
I'll make this quick.
Not for long. [Attack.]
If you didn't want them getting hurt, you shouldn't have sent them after me.
That's your own fault.
You came here to hurt us, but you haven't accomplished anything! The pain you've inflicted on my family is fleeting!
It's not gonna be the only thing burned into your skull.
I'm only getting started.
Laugh! Laugh! You've hurt us, but you cannot take my family from me!
Their minds are dark, but I can hang on to them, give them bodies again, return them from death! I will never find myself alone again!
Just say your goodbyes, you haven't got long left.
Let's get this over with.
I'm not gonna enjoy this, but maybe it's for the best.
I kinda feel sorry for you.
Okay, freak show, time to put you out of your misery.
You really gotta die, nutjob.
You cannot take them from me!
Get out of my home!
